text: Helen Olivia Bicknell Whately (née Lightwood; born 23 June 1976) is a British Conservative Party politician. She has been a Member of Parliament (MP) for Faversham and Mid Kent since 2015. Whately has been the Shadow Secretary of State for Transport since July 2024. She was the Minister of State for Social Care from October 2022 to July 2024. She was in this role before from 2020 to 2021. She also was Exchequer Secretary to the Treasury from 2021 to 2022. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2015–2017 Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:UK MPs 2019–2024 Category:UK MPs 2024–present Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs Category:People from Norwich Category:Politicians from Kent
title: Helen Whately
